frontSide: This is the first card, ever displayed in CardsApp.
backSide: Sadly because it's the first, it doesn't have much content yet. To fix this one needs to implement the feature to edit cards ...
Discard single lines of code. Cherry-pick commits. Work with Submodules. Use git-svn and git-flow... Tower is as powerful as Git - but without the sharp edges.
Bastian Morath is a swiss computer science student and software developer. He's best knwon for co-developing the CardsApp iOS application, that changed the way people learn forever.
